title: Ok its been like 5 patches now...  Is this ever gonna get fixed?
body:
Chat windows.  All of them.  The one at champion select, the one for messaging friends... anywhere you can chat.

Defaults to top of page.  Does not scroll.

To see any new messages, you have to scroll down to see them.

Sucks to be in a conversation with someone and have to scroll every time they send a message.  Champ select isn't as bad.  Most of the time champ select will scroll.  But messages between friends does not.  Have to scroll every time.

Please fix this bug.  Its not hard, and its INCREDIBLY annoying.

replies.body: In game chat is fine but all the others a are doing this ANNOYING AS HELL thing

this is so unbelievably annoying

plz fix

There is still a Lee Sin bug where he can completely ignore taunts if he uses his W in a certain way and that bug exists LITERALLY since his release. No joke. Luckily not many people know how to pull it off, but I made several attempts to report this myself aswell as other people and it always got ignored.

Therefore, this works till today:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/6jJPQkmc-gameplay-lee-sin-is-immune-to-taunts-on-demand

Here are also some older reports of this. Less researched and without a complete recreation guide, but all of these attempts to report this and more have been ignored:

* https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/RJn344ze-gameplay-lee-sin-taunt
* https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ekZjkZVy-gameplay-cant-taunt-lee-sin-consistently
* https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/AswWt07H-taunts-dont-work-on-lee-sin

The oldest existing video footage is from 2012 (found in the third link of this post or rather the second in the list) and in the first link of this hole post is a newer video in a clean testing environment, where you can see everything perfectly fine without any additional particles. And Riot still ignores it.

So stop crying because of a 5 patch old bug or rather missing feature.
